tool_description: Manages chat routing and queue assignments, distributing conversations to available agents based on skills and workload.

required_skills.description: Required agent skills for this conversation

priority_level.description: Routing priority: low, medium, high, urgent

customer_tier.description: Customer service tier for routing preferences

error_messages: Invalid session_id: Session not found or already routed
No available agents: All agents currently occupied
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, medium, high, urgent]
Routing failed: Unable to assign conversation to agent
usage: Provide session_id and optionally required_skills, priority_level, and customer_tier. Routes conversation to most suitable available agent.

queue_position.description: Position in queue (0 if immediately assigned)

routing_status.description: Current routing status: assigned, queued, failed
